analysis.description:
MintableToken.totalSupplyLimit (/unique_chucks/3/0x910dfc18d6ea3d6a7124a6f8b5458f281060fa4c.sol#116) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- mintTokens (/unique_chucks/3/0x910dfc18d6ea3d6a7124a6f8b5458f281060fa4c.sol#117-128)

ERC20Token.salvageTokensFromContract (/unique_chucks/3/0x910dfc18d6ea3d6a7124a6f8b5458f281060fa4c.sol#202-209) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20TokenInterface(_tokenAddress).transfer(_to,_amount) (/unique_chucks/3/0x910dfc18d6ea3d6a7124a6f8b5458f281060fa4c.sol#207-209)

MintableToken.totalSupplyLimit should be constant (/unique_chucks/3/0x910dfc18d6ea3d6a7124a6f8b5458f281060fa4c.sol#116)
OwnedInterface.newOwner should be constant (/unique_chucks/3/0x910dfc18d6ea3d6a7124a6f8b5458f281060fa4c.sol#89-90)
